src:
"SIWANG Dikenalkan di Konferensi Internasional World Zakat Forum"
07 Nov 2019, 18:35 by Afrizal Aziz



"SIWANG Dikenalkan di Konferensi Internasional World Zakat Forum"



"SIWANG Dikenalkan di Konferensi Internasional World Zakat Forum"



"SIWANG Dikenalkan di Konferensi Internasional World Zakat Forum"


KBRN, Bandung : Dompet Dhuafa Jawa Barat pamerkan produk pemberdayaan zakat di acara Konferensi Internasional World Zakat Forum di Bandung, 5-7 November 2019. Produk pemberdayaan yang dipamerkan yaitu Siwang (Terasi Bawang) dari Cirebon. World Zakat Forum merupakan ajang berkumpulnya para pegiat zakat dunia untuk bersama-sama meningkatkan kualitas pengelolaan zakat global untuk tercapainya kesejahteraan dunia. Acara kali ini dihadiri 300 tokoh organisasi pengelola zakat dari 28 negara di dunia. "Kami ingin produk usaha kecil yang diberdayakan dengan dana zakat bisa dikenal tidak hanya di Jawa Barat, tetapi juga di Indonesia bahkan seluruh dunia," papar Pimpinan Cabang Dompet Dhuafa Jabar, Andriansyah, Kamis (07/11/2019).Siwang adalah produk makanan hasil pengrajin asal Desa Setu Kulon, Kecamatan Weru, Kabupaten Cirebon, Jawa Barat yang diberdayakan dengan dana zakat yang dihimpun oleh Dompet Dhuafa Jawa Barat. (Rel)
text:
"SIWANG Introduced at the International Conference of Zakat Forums"
Nov 7 2019, 18:35 by Afrizal Aziz



"SIWANG Introduced at the International Conference of Zakat Forums"



"SIWANG Introduced at the International Conference of Zakat Forums"



"SIWANG Introduced at the International Conference of Zakat Forums"


KBRN, Bandung: Dompet Dhuafa West Java exhibits zakat empowerment products at the International Zakat Forum International Conference in Bandung, 5-7 November 2019. The empowerment product on display is Siwang (Terasi Bawang) from Cirebon. The World Zakat Forum is a gathering place for world zakat activists to jointly improve the quality of global zakat management to achieve world welfare. This event was attended by 300 leaders of zakat management organizations from 28 countries in the world. "We want small business products that are empowered with zakat funds to be known not only in West Java, but also in Indonesia and even throughout the world," said Branch Manager of Dompet Dhuafa Jabar, Andriansyah, Thursday (11/07/2019). Siwang is a food product the results of craftsmen from Setu Kulon Village, Weru District, Cirebon Regency, West Java, were empowered with zakat funds collected by Dompet Dhuafa, West Java. (Rail)
